Text: Please help.  I've downloaded this torrent and DOSBox, but the instructions that came with the torrent don't make any sense.  How do I install?

unzip the .rar and mount the folder, eg "mount c C:\games\descent" then go to C:\ and install. (Haven't installed it yet myself, if it's a .cue file then you need to download Daemon Tools and mount it there first)
